post.summary: Register given device token into app, to be able for triggering and accepting push notifications

get.summary: It will return presigned s3 urls for resources for Job Type

parameters.name: jobTypeId
parameters.description: ID of wanted job type resources

post.summary: It will return addresses based on input string

post.description:
POST request to create a job. The job details are in a JSON object included in the HTTP body.  The minimum details required to create a job are:
jobTitle
clientName
scheduledStartDateTime
Delivery address : either address or values for lng and lat

parameters.name: x-connect-token
parameters.description: Specifies the MyConnectedFleet platform type as token. Set the value for the token to be the response from calling the Request OAuth Token endpoint.

parameters.name: override
parameters.description: Specifies that the HTTP body type to be JSON and that the character set is in UTF-8.

delete.description: DELETE request to delete a job. The response includes summary details of the job that has been deleted.

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: number of job to be deleted

post.description: POST request to generate a presigned post
POST request to retrieve a list of jobs. Jobs are ordered in ascending scheduledStartDateTime order.

get.description: GET request to retrieve a list of jobs where the window defined by scheduled start and planned duration overlaps with another job scheduled for the same resource. The request is limited to future jobs, a 24-hour window and only jobs with duration e.g. 0 mins jobs are omitted.

schema.description: The date and time to begin the search. Start window must be before the end window. Dates entered cannot be wholly in the past. The limit of the query is 24 hours.
The date and time to end the search.

get.summary: Read Job details, 'personId' or 'vehicleId' is mandatory when user is driver

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: number of job to be fetched

parameters.name: personId
parameters.description: Specifies for which driver we fetch the job, mandatory when user is driver

parameters.name: vehicleId
parameters.description: Specifies for which vehicle we fetch the job, mandatory when user is driver

delete.summary: It will delete selected resources if present

post.summary: Update states for both driver and vehicle jobs

post.description: POST request to update just the status of an existing job. If the new status is NEW, then any assigned driver or vehicle will be removed.

post.summary: Update visit results of a Job

get.description: GET request to retrieve a list of jobs.  Like the “List Job” API (See 5.6) , however, returns jobs results that have updates since a specific date/time. The updatedSince cannot be more than 7 days in the past.

parameters.name: updatedSince
parameters.description: Date time used to check changes from , in UTC, in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of jobs to include in the output. If not specified, it will default to 20.  Advise this is not set to greater than 1000 to avoid any issues with response size.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Specifies where to continue listing jobs

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Defines version of API endpoint, supported '1' or '2'

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Defines version of API endpoint, supported '1', '2', '3'

parameters.name: jobNumber
parameters.description: number of job to be deleted

parameters.description: Defines version of API endpoint, supported '1', '2', '3'

parameters.description: Type of image to be uploaded, either job image or job signature

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of wanted workflow

jobNumber.description: Number for the job. If provided must be unique, If not provided then a job number will be generated.

contactName.description: Name of the contact person to receive the order.

contactEmail.description: Email address for the named contact.

contactPhone.description: Phone number for the named contact.

lat.description: Latitude value for the delivery location. Must be specified if a value for address is not specified.  If specified, then a value for lng must also be specified.

lng.description: Longitude value for the delivery location. Must be specified if a value for address is not specified. If specified, then a value for lat must also be specified.

address.description: Full job address. Must be specified if values for lng and lat are not specified. If specified, then values latitude and longitude are derived. If not specified, then will be derived based on the values specified for lng and lat

scheduledStartDateTime.description: Scheduled date & time for fulfilment of the job, in UTC, and formatted as either YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ or YYYY-DD-MM.

jobDuration.description: Scheduled duration for the job in hours and minutes.

arrivalWindowStart.description: The start of the arrival window,  in UTC, and formatted as  YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ.

arrivalWindowEnd.description: The end of the arrival window,  in UTC, and formatted as  YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ.

personId.description: System identifier for an existing driver. If specified then personName will be set to the name of the specified driver.

vehicleId.description: System identifier for an existing vehicle.  If specified then vehicleName will be set to the name of the specified driver.

groupName.description: Name of an existing group. If not specified,  then will default to the root group in the hierarchy.

vehicleName.description: Name of an existing vehicle. If specified then personName will be set to the default driver for the vehicle. If values for both personName and vehicleName have been set then personName must be the default driver that has been set for the specified vehicleName. personName can be any driver if there is no default driver for the specified vehicleName.

orderNumbers.description: Comma separated list of order numbers.

jobRadius.description: Default value is set to 200 metres where no radius is specified.  This can be modified using the jobRadius parameter.

jobTypeId.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) of an existing job type to be assigned to this job.

linkingId.description: Unique identifier (alphanumeric) for creating a linking job. Either linkingId or linkedJobIndex can be specified. If linkingId is specified as an empty string, then a value will be automatically generated.

linkedJobIndex.description: Sequence number for creating a linking job. Either linkingId or linkedJobIndex can be specified.

resources.description: The names of the files you would like to upload to the job (max 3)

groupName.description: Name of a group. Must be specified if a value for either personName or vehicleName is not specified

scheduledStartDateTimeFrom.description: Start of the period of scheduled fulfilment date, in UTC, in the format of either YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ.

scheduledStartDateTimeTo.description: End of the period of scheduled fulfilment date, in UTC, in the format of either YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ.

personName.description: Name of a driver that has been assigned a job. Must be specified if a value for either vehicleName or groupName is not specified.

vehicleName.description: Name of a vehicle that has been assigned a job. Must be specified if a value for either personName or groupName is not specified.

statuses.description: Jobs with the specified status will be included in the response e.g. NEW, ASSIGNED, IN_PROGRESS, ACCEPTED, VISITED.

jobTypeIds.description: Jobs with the specified job type will be included in the response.

limit.description: The number of jobs to include in the output. If not specified, it will default to 20.  Advise this is not set to greater than 1000 to avoid any issues with response size.

nextToken.description: Token returned in a previous call to this endpoint to get the next set of details.

downloadUrl.description: URL to download the signature image

JobStatus.description: Status of the job. Allowed values are: [NEW, ASSIGNED, IN_PROGRESS, VISITED, CANCELLED].

id.description: Unique, unchangeable system generated identifier (alphanumeric) for the job.

scheduledStart.description: Scheduled date & time for fulfilment of the job, in UTC, and formatted as either YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ or YYYY-DD-MM.

duration.description: Scheduled duration for the job in hours and minutes.

resourceId.description: System identifier for an existing driver

fields.description: Information required to copy into the body of the Post call

PrimaryResource.description: Denotes whether the vehicle is assigned to a vehicle or driver

jobNumber.description: System generated identifier for an existing job.

statusUpdateDateTime.description: Date and Time to when the update to the job status occurred, in UTC, and formatted as  YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mmZ. If not specified, the MyConnectedFleet platform server date/time will be used.
